briefTitle: A Controlled Clinical Study to Determine the Gingivitis Benefit of Flossing
officialTitle: A Controlled Clinical Study to Determine the Gingivitis Benefit of Flossing
summary: This is a randomized, controlled, examiner-blind, parallel group, four week clinical study comparing brushing plus flossing to brushing alone in 60 healthy adults with pre-existing gingivitis.

primaryOutcome.measure: Mean Interproximal Lobene Modified Gingival Index Between the Brushing Only Group and the Brushing + Flossing Group
